comments.content:
First, That would be 2 different typefaces. Second, the sample of the smaller one is, well, pretty small, so that doesnt really help ID’ing it.

The smaller / listing one should be ‘ [Alpha Headline](http://web.archive.org/web/20060910033040/http:/www.lineto.com/The+Fonts/Custom+Typefaces/Alpha+Headline/)’, by Cornel Windlin, which now still is an exclusive, corporate typeface for Mitsubishi.

Dav

_[www.typedesign.eu/directory](http://web.archive.org/web/20060910033040/http:/www.typedesign.eu/directory)_
GUIDA could be Fontomas [Mass](http://web.archive.org/web/20060910033040/http:/www.typetype.net/cat/fontomas.html) with a modified G.
